meanings.definition: A type of large sea duck.
meanings.sent1: The eiders swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of eiders near the shore.
meanings.sent3: The eiders decided to have a race to see who could swim the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The eiders glided across the water like elegant ballerinas.
meanings.sent5: The colorful eiders stood out against the blue sea.

meanings.definition: Plural form of eider, referring to multiple eider ducks.
meanings.sent1: Look at all the eiders flying in formation.
meanings.sent2: The eiders nested together in a cozy spot.
meanings.sent3: The eiders held a meeting to discuss their migration plans.
meanings.sent4: The sky was filled with a cloud of eiders.
meanings.sent5: The eiders quacked loudly as they searched for food.
